snippet: Brandon Miller, a former player and assistant at Butler, is 12-16 as head coach there after taking over for Brad Stevens, who reached two national finals before leaving to coach the Celtics.
abstract: Butler University men's basketball team has had a frustrating 12-16 run under new coach Brandon Miller, former player and assistant who follows in a long line of coaches trained up from within the organization; Miller faces daunting legacy in which team has reached the NCAA tournament nine times since 2000.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Miller, a former player and assistant at Butler, is 12-16 as head coach there after taking over for Brad Stevens, who reached two national finals before leaving to coach the Celtics.

headline.main: In Butler’s Trying Season, a Coaching Link to Past Success
headline.print_headline: A Familiar Face on the Bench
